Subject: Query on Email Alert Timing and Activity Count in Endpoint Protector

Customer (Chai Cheen Shun from Averis Sdn. Bhd.) has raised a query regarding the behavior of email alerts in Endpoint Protector (EPP).

Details:

Customer is aware of where to check all the records.

He would like to know how long it takes EPP to send an email once a user triggers an alert.

He observed inconsistencies:

Some email alerts report 1 activity detected.

Some email alerts report up to 10 activities at once.

Request:

Please confirm:

What is the expected delay (if any) between the alert trigger and email notification?

Customer is requesting clarification on the above points. Please advise.
